thread.title: EmotionalSupportPet.com tips for Flying with your Pet
thread.title_full: EmotionalSupportPet.com tips for Flying with your Pet | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: EmotionalSupportPet.com tips for Flying with your Pet
text:
(MENAFN Press) Laporte Colorado: If you have any summer travel plans the staff at EmotionalSupportPet.com would like to remind travelers that you may qualify to certify your pet as an . If you suffer from any identifiable emotional disability you you can obtain a prescription that will allow you to fly with your pet for no additional fees.
Travelers should
Carry extra copies of your prescription to the airport – certifying your pet is necessary
Bring plenty of water for their pets and themselves
Plan ahead – when taking your pet outside when excessively hot try to make your trip as short as possible and bring water for your pet just in case.
Never leave your pet in a hot car. Many stores will let you bring your pet inside when temperatures are too hot outside.
Traveling with your is now easier than ever. Many hotels are now pet friendly and special rooms are available for those traveling with a pet.
EmotionalSupportPet.com would like to wish all travelers a safe and happy trip.
About EmotionalSupportPet.com: EmotionalSupportPet.com is based is Laporte Colorado and was founded on the principle of helping people travel and live with their pets. EmotionalSupportPet.com is the most economical and reliable ESA prescription service on the internet.
http://www.EmotionalSupportPet.com
